00045 enum l4_syscall_flags_t
00046 {
00054   L4_SYSF_NONE      = 0x00,
00055 
00064   L4_SYSF_SEND      = 0x01,
00065 
00075   L4_SYSF_RECV      = 0x02,
00076 
00086   L4_SYSF_OPEN_WAIT = 0x04,
00087 
00095   L4_SYSF_REPLY     = 0x08,
00096 
00103   L4_SYSF_CALL           = L4_SYSF_SEND | L4_SYSF_RECV,
00104 
00111   L4_SYSF_WAIT           = L4_SYSF_OPEN_WAIT | L4_SYSF_RECV,
00112 
00119   L4_SYSF_SEND_AND_WAIT  = L4_SYSF_OPEN_WAIT | L4_SYSF_CALL,
00120 
00127   L4_SYSF_REPLY_AND_WAIT = L4_SYSF_WAIT | L4_SYSF_SEND | L4_SYSF_REPLY
00128 };
00129 
00134 enum l4_cap_consts_t
00135 {
00137   L4_CAP_SHIFT   = 12UL,
00139   L4_CAP_SIZE    = 1UL << L4_CAP_SHIFT,
00140   L4_CAP_OFFSET  = 1UL << L4_CAP_SHIFT,
00145   L4_CAP_MASK    = ~0UL << (L4_CAP_SHIFT -1),
00147   L4_INVALID_CAP = ~0UL << (L4_CAP_SHIFT -1),
00148 
00149   L4_INVALID_CAP_BIT = 1UL << (L4_CAP_SHIFT -1),
00150 };
00151 
00152 enum l4_sched_consts_t
00153 {
00154   L4_SCHED_MIN_PRIO = 0,
00155   L4_SCHED_MAX_PRIO = 255,
00156 };
00157 
00163 enum l4_unmap_flags_t
00164 {
00171   L4_FP_ALL_SPACES   = 0x80000000UL,
00172 
00179   L4_FP_DELETE_OBJ   = 0xc0000000UL,
00180 
00186   L4_FP_OTHER_SPACES = 0x0UL
00187 };

00193 enum l4_msg_item_consts_t
00194 {
00195   L4_ITEM_MAP       = 8, 
00196 
00201   L4_ITEM_CONT      = 1,
00202 
00203   // send
00204   L4_MAP_ITEM_GRANT = 2, 
00205   L4_MAP_ITEM_MAP   = 0, 
00206 
00207   // receive
00212   L4_RCV_ITEM_SINGLE_CAP = L4_ITEM_MAP | 2,
00213 
00218   L4_RCV_ITEM_LOCAL_ID   = 4,
00219 };

00225 enum l4_buffer_desc_consts_t
00226 {
00227   L4_BDR_MEM_SHIFT   = 0,  
00228   L4_BDR_IO_SHIFT    = 5,  
00229   L4_BDR_OBJ_SHIFT   = 10, 
00230   L4_BDR_OFFSET_MASK = (1UL << 20) - 1,
00231 };

00248 enum l4_default_caps_t
00249 {
00251   L4_BASE_TASK_CAP      = 1UL << L4_CAP_SHIFT,
00253   L4_BASE_FACTORY_CAP   = 2UL << L4_CAP_SHIFT,
00255   L4_BASE_THREAD_CAP    = 3UL << L4_CAP_SHIFT,
00257   L4_BASE_PAGER_CAP     = 4UL << L4_CAP_SHIFT,
00259   L4_BASE_LOG_CAP       = 5UL << L4_CAP_SHIFT,
00261   L4_BASE_ICU_CAP       = 6UL << L4_CAP_SHIFT,
00263   L4_BASE_SCHEDULER_CAP = 7UL << L4_CAP_SHIFT,
00264 };

00276 #define L4_PAGESIZE   (1UL << L4_PAGESHIFT)
00277 
00285 #define L4_PAGEMASK   (~(L4_PAGESIZE - 1))
00286 
00294 #define L4_LOG2_PAGESIZE  L4_PAGESHIFT
00295 
00303 #define L4_SUPERPAGESIZE  (1UL << L4_SUPERPAGESHIFT)
00304 
00312 #define L4_SUPERPAGEMASK  (~(L4_SUPERPAGESIZE - 1))
00313 
00320 #define L4_LOG2_SUPERPAGESIZE L4_SUPERPAGESHIFT
00321 
00328 L4_INLINE l4_addr_t l4_trunc_page(l4_addr_t address) L4_NOTHROW;
00329 L4_INLINE l4_addr_t l4_trunc_page(l4_addr_t x) L4_NOTHROW
00330 { return x & L4_PAGEMASK; }
00331 
00339 L4_INLINE l4_addr_t l4_trunc_size(l4_addr_t address, unsigned char bits) L4_NOTHROW;
00340 L4_INLINE l4_addr_t l4_trunc_size(l4_addr_t x, unsigned char bits) L4_NOTHROW
00341 { return x & (~0UL << bits); }
00342 
00349 L4_INLINE l4_addr_t l4_round_page(l4_addr_t address) L4_NOTHROW;
00350 L4_INLINE l4_addr_t l4_round_page(l4_addr_t x) L4_NOTHROW
00351 { return (x + L4_PAGESIZE-1) & L4_PAGEMASK; }
00352 
00360 L4_INLINE l4_addr_t l4_round_size(l4_addr_t address, unsigned char bits) L4_NOTHROW;
00361 L4_INLINE l4_addr_t l4_round_size(l4_addr_t x, unsigned char bits) L4_NOTHROW
00362 { return (x + (1UL << bits) - 1) & (~0UL << bits); }
00363 
00368 enum l4_addr_consts_t {
00370   L4_INVALID_ADDR = ~0UL
00371 };
00372 
00377 #define L4_INVALID_PTR ((void*)L4_INVALID_ADDR)

00379 #ifndef NULL

00381 # define NULL ((void *)0)  
00385 #else
00386 # define NULL 0
00387 #endif
